archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Select External Party
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Brief Description Select the party to whom an outbound product offering purchase in the form of an product offering order will be sent. identify the most appropriate external party or parties amongst those with whom an appropriate agreement exists. Extended Description Select Outbound Purchase Party identifies the most appropriate party parties, to whom a product offering purchase may be sent. The selection of the party is based on the particular product, service and/or resource requirements and the feasibility of a party being able to meet the requirements. Select External Party identifies the most appropriate external party or parties amongst those with whom an appropriate agreement exists. Based on the particular product, service and/or resource requirements, select the most appropriate party from the range of parties with whom a agreement exists.
